pkgmetadata.longdescription: Durability of Vaccine Efficacy // Implements a nonparametric maximum likelihood method for evaluating the durability of vaccine efficacy in a randomized, placebo-controlled clinical trial with staggered enrollment of participants and potential crossover of placebo recipients. Lin, D. Y., Zeng, D., and Gilbert, P. B. (2021) doi:10.1101/2021.01.13.21249779.
